verses.verse: Then <S%H6691>Zophar,<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite,<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
<S%H7230>"Shouldn't<s%> the multitude of <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H6030>answered?<s%> Should a <S%H376>man<s%> full of <S%H8193>talk<s%> be <S%H6663>justified?<s%>
Should your <S%H907>boastings<s%> <S%H2790>make<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> hold their <S%H2790>peace?<s%> When you <S%H3932>mock,<s%> shall no man make you <S%H3637>ashamed?<s%>
For you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3948><s%> 'My doctrine is <S%H2134>pure.<s%> I am <S%H1249>clean<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>'
<S%H199>But<s%> oh <S%H5414>that<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H6605>open<s%> his lips against <S%H8193>you,<s%>

that he would <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom!<s%> For true <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> has <S%H3718>two<s%> <S%H8454>sides.<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore that <S%H433>God<s%> exacts of you less than your iniquity <S%H5771>deserves.<s%>
"Can you <S%H2714>fathom<s%> the <S%H4672>mystery<s%> of <S%H433>God?<s%> Or can you <S%H4672>probe<s%> the <S%H8503>limits<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty?<s%>
They are <S%H1363>high<s%> as <S%H8064>heaven.<s%> What can you <S%H6466>do?<s%> They are <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%> What can you <S%H3045>know?<s%>
Its <S%H4055>measure<s%> is <S%H752>longer<s%> than the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7342>broader<s%> than the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
If he passes <S%H2498>by,<s%> or <S%H5462>confines,<s%> or <S%H6950>convenes<s%> a <S%H7725>court,<s%> then who can oppose him?
For he <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H4962>men.<s%> He <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> <S%H995>also,<s%> even though he doesn't consider it.
An <S%H5014>empty-headed<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> becomes <S%H3823>wise<s%> when a <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> as a wild <S%H6501>donkey<s%>'s <S%H5895>colt.<s%>
"If you <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6566>aright,<s%> stretch out your hands toward <S%H3709>him.<s%>
If <S%H205>iniquity<s%> is in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> put it far <S%H7368>away.<s%> <S%H5766>Don't<s%> let unrighteousness <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in your <S%H168>tents.<s%>
Surely then you shall lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> without <S%H3971>spot;<s%> <S%H3332>Yes,<s%> you shall be steadfast, and shall not <S%H3372>fear:<s%>
for you shall <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H5999>misery.<s%> You shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> it as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are passed <S%H5674>away.<s%>
<S%H2465>Life<s%> shall be <S%H6965>clearer<s%> than the <S%H6672>noonday.<s%> Though there is <S%H5774>darkness,<s%> it shall be as the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
You shall be <S%H982>secure,<s%> because there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H8615>hope.<s%> <S%H2658>Yes,<s%> you shall search, and shall take your <S%H7901>rest<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
Also you shall lie <S%H7257>down,<s%> and none shall make you <S%H2729>afraid.<s%> <S%H7227>Yes,<s%> many shall <S%H2470>court<s%> your <S%H6440>favor.<s%>

But the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail.<s%> They shall have no way to <S%H6>flee.<s%> Their <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall be the giving <S%H4646>up<s%> of the <S%H5315>spirit.<s%>"
